ygData.subject: RE: Runed Bone Fork (call for a spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: Don t know where it comes from (cause I want one too) but the stats are +10 to MR, FR, and CR i believe. Disputed to be the best range slot item that you d
ygData.messageBody:
Don't know where it comes from (cause I want one too) but the stats are +10
to MR, FR, and CR i believe. Disputed to be the best range slot item that
you'd never want to throw.

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)
